headline: US Oil Drilling Activity Continues to Slow
summary: The total number of active drilling rigs for oil and gas in the United States fell again this week, according to new data that Baker Hughes published on Friday.

raw.headline: US Oil Drilling Activity Continues to Slow
raw.summary: The total number of active drilling rigs for oil and gas in the United States fell again this week, according to new data that Baker Hughes published on Friday.

headline: Baker Hughes Drives Next-Gen Technology in Louisiana LNG
summary: BKR's turbines and compressors will power Commonwealth LNG's Louisiana plant, marking a major step toward its 2025 investment decision.

raw.headline: Baker Hughes Drives Next-Gen Technology in Louisiana LNG
raw.summary: BKR's turbines and compressors will power Commonwealth LNG's Louisiana plant, marking a major step toward its 2025 investment decision.
